trans-unit.source: Represents security information for client application services, which includes role information.

When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Quando si convalida un utente in servizi delle applicazioni client, il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> imposta il `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà a un'istanza di questa classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> Inizializza il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> una nuova istanza della proprietà il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> Inizializza il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> proprietà per il <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> oggetto restituito dal `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo.

trans-unit.source: You will not typically access this class directly.
trans-unit.target: Non si accederà in genere questa classe direttamente.

trans-unit.source: Normally, you will call the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: In genere, si chiamerà il <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> metodo il <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> restituito dal `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: However, you can cast the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property value to a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> reference to call the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method explicitly, as demonstrated in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, è possibile eseguire il cast di <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> valore della proprietà da un <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> riferimento per chiamare il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> (metodo) in modo esplicito, come illustrato nella sezione esempio.

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates how to use this class to display a button only when the user is in the "manager" role.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare questa classe per visualizzare un pulsante solo quando l'utente è nel ruolo "manager".

trans-unit.source: This example requires a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `managerOnlyButton` with an initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio è richiesto un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> denominato `managerOnlyButton` con un'iniziale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> valore della proprietà `false`.

trans-unit.source: Represents the current user.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal" /> class.
The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property is initialized with the value of the `identity` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> il valore della proprietà viene inizializzata la `identity` parametro.

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Quando si convalida un utente in servizi delle applicazioni client, il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> imposta il `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà a un'istanza di questa classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> Inizializza il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> una nuova istanza della proprietà il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> Inizializza il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> proprietà per il <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> oggetto restituito dal `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the security identity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal" />.
Represents the current user.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta l'utente corrente.

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Quando si convalida un utente in servizi delle applicazioni client, il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> imposta il `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà a un'istanza di questa classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> Inizializza il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> una nuova istanza della proprietà il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> Inizializza il <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> proprietà per il <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> oggetto restituito dal `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The role to check.
Gets a value indicating whether the user represented by the <see cref="T:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal" /> is in the specified role.
<see langword="true" /> if the user is in the specified role; <see langword="false" /> if the user is not in the specified role or is not authenticated.

Normally, you will call the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: In genere, si chiamerà il <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> metodo il <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> restituito dal `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: However, you can cast the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property value to a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> reference to call this method explicitly, as demonstrated in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, è possibile eseguire il cast di <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> valore della proprietà da un <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> riferimento per chiamare questo metodo in modo esplicito, come illustrato nella sezione esempio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method will always return `false` if the user login has expired.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> restituirà sempre `false` se l'accesso utente è scaduto.

trans-unit.source: This will not occur if your application calls the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method one time shortly after authentication.
trans-unit.target: Ciò non si verifica se l'applicazione chiama il <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> metodo una volta subito dopo l'autenticazione.

trans-unit.source: If your application must retrieve user roles at other times, you might want to add code to revalidate users whose login has expired.
trans-unit.target: Se l'applicazione deve recuperare ruoli utente in altri momenti, è necessario aggiungere il codice per riconvalidare gli utenti con accesso scaduto.

trans-unit.source: If all valid users are assigned to roles, you can determine whether the login has expired by calling the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Se tutti gli utenti validi sono stati assegnati ai ruoli, è possibile determinare se l'accesso è scaduto chiamando il metodo <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: If no roles are returned, the login has expired.
trans-unit.target: Se non viene restituito alcun ruolo, l'accesso è scaduto.

trans-unit.source: For an example of this functionality, see the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio di questa funzionalità, vedere il metodo <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> .

trans-unit.source: This functionality is only necessary if you have selected **Require users to log on again whenever the server cookie expires** in your application configuration.
trans-unit.target: Questa funzionalità è necessaria solo se è stato selezionato **Richiedi agli utenti di accedere di nuovo a ogni scadenza del cookie del server** nella configurazione dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md).
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere [Procedura: Configurare i servizi delle applicazioni client](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to display a button only when the user is in the "manager" role.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare questo metodo per visualizzare un pulsante solo quando l'utente è nel ruolo "manager".

trans-unit.source: This example requires a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `managerOnlyButton` with an initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio è richiesto un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> denominato `managerOnlyButton` con un'iniziale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> valore della proprietà `false`.
